definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Interpret data metric results and translate these results to business terminology.
sentences.chinese: 解释数据度量结果并把这些结果转换为业务术语。

sentences.english: The measures describe ways to measure how each goal is met.
sentences.chinese: 量度描述了度量如何满足每个目标的方法。

sentences.english: In this example, the component itself provides the measurement.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，组件本身提供了度量。

sentences.english: For example, many operating systems measure time in units of tens of milliseconds.
sentences.chinese: 例如，许多操作系统以几十毫秒作为时间度量的单位。

sentences.english: The light perceived by the human eye is measured in units called lumen-hours.
sentences.chinese: 人类眼睛所观测到的光是以流明小时这种单位度量的。

sentences.english: The principal measure of progress is working software.
sentences.chinese: 主要的进度度量标准是工作软件。

sentences.english: The metric of process quality is the base of quality control in R&D project.
sentences.chinese: 过程质量度量是项目质量控制中的基础。
度量可以帮助积极的管理项目。

sentences.english: Did not ourselves the cubits warp, for fear to be a king.
sentences.chinese: 不正是我们自己歪曲了度量，不敢称王称霸。

sentences.english: This factor, although difficult to quantify, can be gauged using various metrics.
sentences.chinese: 这项因素虽然难量化，可以被衡量使用不同的度量。

sentences.english: Note that in our screenshot we show all of the available metrics options.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，在截图中显示了所有可用的度量选项。

sentences.english: If you cannot specify actions to take, why do you measure?
sentences.chinese: 如果您不能指定要采取的行动，那么为什么要度量？

sentences.english: Gathering all these factoids is very easy using code metrics.
sentences.chinese: 使用代码度量收集所有这些似乎正确的信息非常容易。

sentences.english: The interquartile range is a measure of dispersion in a dataset.
sentences.chinese: 四分位范围就是数据集分散度的一种度量手段。

sentences.english: Code metrics are a way to mathematically calculate the complexity of code.
sentences.chinese: 代码度量是一种计算代码复杂度的数学方法。
鲍林也确实做到了用数据来度量它。

definition: one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
(lit. quantity of spirit)/moral character/degree of forbearance/broad-mindedness or otherwise/tolerance/magnanimity
